fixes.name: Initial Cash USD T
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR useCustom = SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As])
VAR endDateParam = SELECTEDVALUE('End Date'[Display As])
RETURN
IF(
    useCustom = TRUE(),
    IF(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Max Date] = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate],
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Ut. US MM],
        0
    ),
    IF(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate] = endDateParam,
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Ut. US MM],
        0
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Recreated the nested IF logic in DAX. Parameters are accessed with SELECTEDVALUE('ParameterName'[Display As]). All column references are converted to 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[ColumnName]. The measure returns 'Ut. US MM' when the specified conditions are met, otherwise 0.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter, and all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
